Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm safe! Luckily I detonated the weapon in time...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "This is all a trap... What's happening to Lucia and the rest of them?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia! Something's gone really wrong with Browning! There's no distractor! It's all a setup! Don't approach the Golden Vortex building, you're all in danger!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "The comms of all the teams sent by Babylonia are getting interfered with, including the Gray Ravens'.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You've made a mess of yourself again. You shouldn't continue the mission in your current state.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Why is Babylonia sending in the Purifying Force? Does it mean that... there's a Construct in that building?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's not it. My target's not inside the Golden Vortex.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We've set up a temporary base inside the desert—here are the coordinates. I hope you can get yourself fixed up when you get there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Please don't say something like that to me! I can still fight!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Even though... even though my weapon is destroyed, I can still help out in other ways...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can follow you and protect you! I can do it, I promise!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Liv, you and I belong to different teams. I have no authority over what you do, but as a fellow warrior of Babylonia, I hope you'll grow—not just stronger...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "But wiser as well. If you insist on operating in this state, not only will you hurt yourself, you'll endanger other squads as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...I understand now. I'll head to the base immediately...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Don't forget to check your Inver-Device when you get there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "If she knew I'm here to save her commandant, she would have followed me no matter how hurt she was.", 4: '1'}
